grape.embiggen.utils.parameter_validators package¶

Submodules¶

grape.embiggen.utils.parameter_validators.validate_verbose module¶

Return validated verbose candidate, raising a meaningful error otherwise.

param candidate_verbose

The candidate verbose value to validate.

type candidate_verbose

Union[bool, int],

raises ValueError,

If the provided verbose parameter is not within the allowed set of values.

returns

rtype

The validated value.

The candidate window size value to validate.

type candidate_window size

int,

raises ValueError,

If the provided window size parameter is not within the allowed set of values.

returns

The validated value.

Module contents¶

Submodule to validate parameters from user input with meaningful errors.
